categoryPosts.title: Sky Palette Project: 1. The Beginning of the Journey
categoryPosts.excerpt: Sky Palette Project is a project that I started to extract colors from the sky. A professor once told me that the sky is the best color palette that a designer can use. The sky has a natural color gradient that is harmonious. I wanted to extract the colors of the sky and make it into a color palette. To begin that journey I first created a sky capturer for capturing the image of the skies
